title: Lulu splash art rework

embed.description: I love lulu and i feel that she needed a splash done, so heres my version!

body:
So i did a fan splash art for lulu! shes so cute but evil heh
Let me know what you think! <3 hope you like it 
I linked on artstation and heres the deviant art one as well
https://hamzilla15.deviantart.com/art/Lulu-splash-fan-rework-738797699

replies.body: I'd rather this as her splash now :)
